definitions: the action of moving or being moved gently to and fro or from side to side

examples.text: I was lulled to sleep by the rocking of the ship

shortDefinitions: action of moving or being moved to and fro or from side to side

definitions: moving gently to and fro or from side to side

examples.text: the rocking movement of the boat

shortDefinitions: moving gently to and fro or from side to side

definitions: (of a place) full of excitement or social activity

examples.text: a rocking resort with golden sandy beaches and round-the-clock entertainment

shortDefinitions: full of excitement or social activity
